title: $:/litClock/times/-10:15-Agatha Christie
quote_last: Arlena departed from her rondezvous, a minute or two later Patrick Redfern came down and registered surprise, annoyance, etc. Christine’s task was easy enough. Keeping her own watch concealed she asked she asked Linda at twenty-five past eleven what time it was. Linda looked at her watch and replied that it was a quarter to twelve.
